TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md). 事件发生仅当调用方法。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类反序列化`Group`从名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 每当在不具备对应成员在类中，该文件中找到的元素事件发生。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要试用示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.XmlAttribute Attr { get; }
.property instance class System.Xml.XmlAttribute Attr
Public ReadOnly Property Attr As XmlAttribute
public: property System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ Attr { System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示未知的 XML 特性。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the unknown XML attribute.
An that represents the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类反序列化`Group`从名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 每当在不具备对应成员在类中，该文件中找到的元素事件发生。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要试用示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string ExpectedAttributes { get; }
.property instance string ExpectedAttributes
Public ReadOnly Property ExpectedAttributes As String
public: property System::String ^ ExpectedAttributes { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XML 特性名的逗号分隔列表，该列表应出现在 XML 文档实例中。

span.span: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML attribute names expected to be in an XML document instance.

value.span: XML 特性名的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of XML attribute names.
Each name is in the following format: :.

MemberSignature.Value: public int LineNumber { get; }
.property instance int32 LineNumber
Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取未知 XML 特性的行号。

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML attribute.

value.span: 未知 XML 特性的行号。

span.span: The line number of the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类反序列化`Group`从名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 每当在不具备对应成员在类中，该文件中找到的元素事件发生。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要试用示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownAttributes.xml 的文件。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取未知 XML 特性行中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML attribute.

value.span: 未知 XML 特性的位置编号。

span.span: The position number of the unknown XML attribute.

value.span: 正在被反序列化的对象。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例输出返回的值方法时方法遇到未知的属性。The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown attribute. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
